title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Double Agent
notes:
Excellent controller support. Performance is very good, but the highest widescreen resolution is 1280x960. There is a fix available, but I couldn't get it to work.
https://github.com/ThirteenAG/WidescreenFixesPack/releases/tag/scda
Enabling High Detail Shader crashes the game. Other than that, game runs flawlessly.
title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Double Agent®

notes: Enabling High Detail Shader crashes the game, and mouse cursor isn't visible inside Steam Overlay. Other than that, runs flawlessly.
